rescuecore2.standard.kernel.comms
Class AbstractChannel

java.lang.Object
  rescuecore2.standard.kernel.comms.AbstractChannel
All Implemented Interfaces:
Channel
Direct Known Subclasses:
RadioChannel, VoiceChannel
public abstract class AbstractChannel
extends java.lang.Object
implements Channel

Abstract base class for channels.

setInputNoise

public void setInputNoise(Noise noise)
Description copied from interface: Channel
Set the input noise object for this channel. Input noise is applied to the message once on arrival.

Specified by:
setInputNoise in interface Channel
Parameters:
noise - The input noise.

setOutputNoise

public void setOutputNoise(Noise noise)
Description copied from interface: Channel
Set the output noise object for this channel. Output noise is applied to the message once for each listener as it is sent.

Specified by:
setOutputNoise in interface Channel
Parameters:
noise - The output noise.

addMessageForAgent

protected void addMessageForAgent(Entity a,
                                  AKSpeak msg)
Register a message that should be send to an agent on the next call to @{link #getMessagesForAgent(AgentProxy)}. This method will ignore the subscribers list so subclasses should use @{link #isSubscribed(Entity)} if they wish to restrict messages to subscribers only.

Parameters:
a - The agent.
msg - The message.

addMessageForSubscribers

protected void addMessageForSubscribers(AKSpeak msg)
Register a message that should be send to all subscribers.

Parameters:
msg - The message.

isSubscribed

protected boolean isSubscribed(Entity e)
Find out if an entity is subscribed to this channel.

Parameters:
e - The entity to check.
Returns:
True iff the entity is subscribed to this channel.
